en.goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
en.indicator_name: Level of national compliance of labour rights (freedom of association and collective bargaining) based on International Labour Organization (ILO) textual sources and national legislation, by sex and migrant status
en.target_name: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment
en.un_designated_tier: Tier II
en.page_content:
In progress
A suitable data source has been identified. The corresponding time series are currently being processed to be included in this reporting platform.
